title: Hearty Oat and Raisin Scones
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons orange juice', '4 tablespoons water', '145g raisins', '160g porridge oats', '375g plain flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '3 tablespoons caster sugar', '225g unsalted butter, cubed', '310ml cold milk']
